short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple pricing validator with multiple line items

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A versatile pricing validator that supports single or multiple line items, enabling users to seamlessly calculate discounts from totals and vice versa. Perfect for quick, accurate pricing breakdowns with auto-calculation functionality.

Discount percentage inputs are limited to 2 decimals in this version. The auto-calculate function adjusts results accordingly as the user clicks out.
